title: Sixth Sense Killer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a role. You will attack one player who has that role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You always know all roles that are alive and how many there are of each.
- You cannot choose to attack a player by name, only by role.
- If multiple players have the same role and you wish to attack that role, you must specify a player priority list. You will attack the player higher on the list.

desc:
Post 5477
I lost my eye's sight, but gained another...
